full_summary:
Government of Canada
Tender Notification
K4D34-230504 - Air Handling Unit RFP
==========================

**Request for Proposals**
-------------------------

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of the Environment (ECCC) is seeking offers from qualified offerors to provide a custom air handling unit to replace system 22 at the Canada Centre for Inland Waters in Burlington, Ontario, Canada.

### Tender Details
---------------

*   Solicitation Number: [WS4115572435](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17480590?extsite=MTc0ODA1OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   Tender Closing Date and Time: 5 October 2023, 14:00 (EDT)

### Unspsc Code(s)
-----------------

*   UNSPSC code: 40101500 (Ventilation), 40101600 (Air circulation and parts and accessories)

### Tender Status
-----------------

*   Tender status: Expiré (Expired)

### Regions of Opportunity
-------------------------

*   Region of opportunity: Burlington, Ontario

### Trade Agreements
------------------

*   This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information
----------------------

*   Contact Name: Darlene Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### How to submit a bid
-----------------------

Bids must be submitted in electronic format through the [Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17480590?extsite=MTc0ODA1OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).   All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the closing date and time specified above.  Any
